casebody.data:
Richard Newton, administrator of the estate of Josephine Newton, deceased, appellee, v. Metropolitan Life Insurance Company, appellant.Gen. No. 38,839.

Matchett, P. J., dissents.

Opinion filed July 7, 1936.Hoyne, O’Connor & Rubinkam, for appellant; Nathaniel Rubinkam and William S. Allen, of counsel. Henry C. Ferguson and David H. Bowen, for appellee; Henry C. Ferguson, of counsel. Mr. Justice O’Connor

delivered the opinion of the court.
